poem:
### The Deluge

Trump's waves crash with force,  
a tsunami of blazing noise.  
The sand gives way,  
unsure beneath the load;  
a shepherd's crook  
in a blustering gale.  
Messiah or mirage,   
only the driftwood knows.  
Yet, in the storm's roar,  
silence whispers  
to those who listen.
